ai_description.ru: Интерес к ролевым сценариям. Гейтит: boss, teacher, doctor, stranger, pet-play, ddlg.
ai_description.en: Interest in roleplay scenarios. Gates: boss, teacher, doctor, stranger, pet-play, ddlg.

user_description.ru: Ты — босс. Он — подчинённый, которого ты вызвала в кабинет.
user_description.en: You're the boss. He's the subordinate you called to your office.

image_prompt: woman in suit sitting at desk, man in shirt standing nervously before her, office
